thread.section_title: Pigeon Mountain Trading Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pigeon Mountain Trading Company | pigeonmountaintrading.com
thread.title: Diane
thread.title_full: Pigeon Mountain Trading Company reviewed by Diane

author: Diane
title: Diane
text: I've never purchased from them before. We have been looking for packaged bees for several years but couldn't find anyone who would ship. Not only did Pigeon Mountain have the packaged bees but they also shipped. Ordering was easy and we can't wait to get them. I even referred a friend to their web site so he could order packaged bees.
